author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THIRTEEN-E HEADING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THIRTEEN-E HEADING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Thu Sep 11 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 16.0, -99.6 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THIRTEEN-E HEADING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Thu Sep 11 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 16.0, -99.6 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Thirteen-E (EP3/EP132025)
